page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: There are several small businesses in this area,including a{nursery garden. This grows and sells{herbacous plants, {herbs}and{tomato and vegetable plants} in season.It is a family business that struggles to keep going against increased competition from large garden centres in the area offering cut prices and attractions like restaurants and play centres. However it does offer employment to several people,both in their nursery and their shop in the{Grainger Market in{Newcastle.}They have adapted to local demands by keeping {goats}which provide milk for children with{excema and{cows milk allergy.}
